nodes.text: Siltcrawlers were creatures from the Outer Rim planet Nelvaan. They dug burrows for homes, were capable of hibernation, and lived in colonies. The massive and carnivorous horaxes often split open these burrows with their snout horns in order to eat entire colonies whole.
Siltcrawlers were mentioned in the original Databank entry "Horax" on StarWars.com.
